hero.description: Ukuxhuma abaphikisani emhlabeni wonke. Zijwayeze nabancintisani abavela kuwo wonke amazwe ngokufanisa okuhlakaniphile, izikhathi eziguquguqukayo kanye nemiqhudelwano eshibhile eqala ku-$30-35 kuphela. Thola izinsiza ezikhethekile zamalungu. Imifomathi eminingi: LD, TP, Parli ne-Moot Court.

features.title: Izici ze-Ziggy Inkulumo-mpikiswano Ku-Inthanethi
features.subtitle: Bona konke i-Ziggy ekunikezayo! Kusukela emqhudelwaneni womhlaba wonke kuya ezinsizeni ezikhethekile zamalungu.

worldwide.title: Umqhudelwano Womhlaba Wonke
worldwide.description: Phikisana nabafundi abavela emhlabeni wonke. Ukufinyelela okulula kwabancintisani abakude.

powermatching.title: Ukufanisa Okuhlakaniphile
powermatching.description: Ncintisana nabancintisani abanezinga elifanayo lokwazi ngokusebenzisa uhlelo lwethu oluthuthukile.

affordable.title: Intengo Ephansi
affordable.description: Imiqhudelwano ye-Ziggy ibiza kancane kakhulu kuneminye imiqhudelwano yobuso nobuso—$30-35 kuphela!

support.title: Ukusekela Kwamakhasimende
support.description: Xhumana nathi noma nini. Sivame ukuphendula phakathi namahora ama-2.

privacy.title: Ubumfihlo
privacy.description: Siyabuqaphela ubumfihlo bakho futhi sivikele amakhasi anolwazi lokuxhumana.

flexibility.title: Ukuguquguquka
flexibility.description: I-Ziggy ikuvumela wena nomphikisi wakho ukuthi nihlelele ukuthi nizokhuluma nini.

awards.title: Imiklomelo Nemifundaze
awards.description: Abancintisani abaphezulu bathola izinto ze-Ziggy zamahhala! Sinikeza imifundaze kubafundi abagqamile.

scheduling.title: Ukuhlela Okuthuthukile
scheduling.description: Khetha amarawundi/amasonto okushiya futhi uhlele ngokuvumelana nokutholakala kwakho.

realResults.title: Imiphumela Yangempela
realResults.description: Abaphikisani be-Ziggy banerekhodi elifakazelwe lokwenza kahle emiqhudelwaneni yeleague.

analytics.title: Ukuhlaziywa
analytics.description: Thola imiklomelo yamaqembu aphezulu nezinga eliphelele ekupheleni komqhudelwano ngamunye.

formats.title: Izitayela Eziningi Zokuphikisana
formats.description: Sinikeza i-LD, TP, inkulumo-mpikiswano yeqembu elincane, i-Parli yeqembu nomuntu ngamunye, ne-Moot Court.

prepGroup.title: Iqembu Lokulungiselela i-NCFCA
prepGroup.description: Amalungu e-Ziggy TP angafaka isicelo seQembu Lokulungiselela i-NCFCA.

testimonials.title: Okushiwo Abaphikisani Bethu
testimonials.subtitle: Ubufakazi bangempela obuvela kubancintisani abaphumelele ne-Ziggy Inkulumo-mpikiswano Ku-Inthanethi.

cta.title: Ulungele Ukuqala Uhambo Lwakho Lokuba Yiqhawe?
cta.subtitle: Hlangana nezinkulungwane zabaphikisani abathemba inkundla yethu yokuvelela emqhudelwaneni.
